page.title: 11HOLME LACY HOUSE 2
page.content: Now the house is empty,in{1985,}and probably{1986.}Five years past from 1986,it closed down.If you have read {page 10}you would know that it was used as an{old peoples' home.}It closed because of reduction in the health service .They did not have enough money to run it.The old people were moved to Saint{Mary's Hospital}in the{city of Hereford.}It is now empty; workmen are re-rendering the sides,it is covered in scaffolding. People are not allowed inside because of the{asbestos dust}in the doors, for stopping fire.This can make walking hard.
